snippet: The president of Ecuador, Rafael Correa, denied on Tuesday a report on the Web site of The Guardian that he had decided to grant asylum to the WikiLeaks founder, Julian Assange.
abstract: Pres Rafael Correa of Ecuador denies report posted on the Web site of The Guardian that he has decided to grant asylum to WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange.
lead_paragraph: The president of Ecuador, Rafael Correa, denied on Tuesday a report on the Web site of The Guardian that he had decided to grant asylum to the WikiLeaks founder, Julian Assange.

headline.seo: President of Ecuador Denies Granting Asylum to Julian Assange
headline.main: Ecuador: President Denies Decision to Grant WikiLeaks Founder Asylum
headline.print_headline: Ecuador: President Denies Decision To Grant WikiLeaks Founder Asylum
